name: Farming Frenzy (HSDrummond, rororo707, Clay_IV, Dzok, Pachwoom)
name_original: Farming Frenzy (HSDrummond, rororo707, Clay_IV, Dzok, Pachwoom)
description:
Jump right into a fun farming mini-game where you can go up against a friend or fiendish robot.

You are constantly receiving orders to complete and once you finish one, on to the next! Whoever completes the most amount of orders wins.

Meet adorable animals,

and Most Importantly, GET FARMING!!! 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls are different for each player

Player 1Player 2MovementWASDArrow KeysPick UpPress EPress  /Drop ItemHold EHold  /
